comment:
Extracted Variables:
- \( x \): number of units of chemical A added to the mixer
- \( y \): number of units of chemical B added to the mixer

Extracted Constraints:
- \( x \geq 300 \): at least 300 units of chemical A in the mixer
- \( x \leq 3y \): at most a third as much chemical A as chemical B in the mixer
- \( x + y \geq 1500 \): at least 1500 units of total chemicals in the mixer

Extracted Objective:
- Minimize the total time: \( 30x + 45y \)
